title: Donations, diversified for local and global impact
text: Consumers/audiences as in individuals/communities that declare those demands decide how and where impact will be delivered. There will be no price-tags; especially on people, as in market-place like platforms whatsoever, period.

section.title: Temporal scope of impact
section.content: By giving a time period ahead, aka. demand-on-air; audiecences would be able to decide until when their potential impact will stand.

section.title: Spatial scope of impact
section.content: A local and global impact have been bypassed in each purchase however, this situation could be improved by reserving a percentage of the affordable for causes to support NGOs, locally and/or globally.
